author: battibass
body:
This PR is a backport of [PR23071](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23071), intended to fix the T0 issue related to pathALCARECODtCalib reported in [this HN thread](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/tier0-Ops/1862/1.html).

What it does is making the production of a few plots (hence the access to some products) configurable and disables them in the 2018 era.
title: Add flag to configure production of DDU-based trigger synch plots [10_1_X]
